sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react';
import Input from './components/Input';
import Button from './components/button';
import {Container, Content, Row, Column} from './style';

const App = () => {
  const [currentNumber, setCurrentNumber] = useState(0);
  return (
    <Container>
      <Content>
        <Input value={currentNumber} />
        <Row>
            <Button label="x" />
            <Button label="/"/>
            <Button label="C"/>
            <Button label="X"/>
          </Row>
          <Row>
            <Button label="7" />
            <Button label="8"/>
            <Button label="9"/>
            <Button label="-"/>
          </Row>
          <Row>
            <Button label="4" />
            <Button label="5"/>
            <Button label="6"/>
            <Button label="+"/>
          </Row>
          <Row>
            <Button label="1" />
            <Button label="2"/>
            <Button label="3"/>
            <Button label="="/>
          </Row>
      
      </Content>
    </Container>
  );
}

export default App;
